import React, { Component } from 'react' import Header from './common/Header' import Pen from "./assets/images/icons/funeral.png"; import Zoom from "./assets/images/icons/zoom.png"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default class Funeral extends Component { render() { return (

Funeral Arrangements



SERVICE OF SONGS

An evening of hymns and psalms

Date: Wednesday 5th of August, 2020

Time: 4:00pm

Click Here to Watch

{/* View Program */}



FUNERAL

Date: Thursday 6th of August, 2020

Time: 10:00am

Click Here to Watch

{/* View Program */}

) } }
